game_name: Police Response VR Disturbance FREE DEMO
game_description: FREE DEMO Experience an original cartoon reality. The Disturbance is set at 1 address, you take on whatever is presented before you. Have you got the weapon drawing skills to cope in pressure situations? In this game, you don't have the option to run away During the scenarios, you choose the right time to react if required without using excessive force in order to progress through the ranks. You the officer have to dynamically risk assess the situation you're faced within this game Easy Mode - rookie play through allows you to draw weapons without failing. This is set as the default Normal Mode - professional play through allows you to play the game as originally intended Circumstances are likely to change extremely quickly to test if you can react to any situation You're armed with a side arm pistol, taser, pepper spray and handcuffs Complete your 30 years and reach your retirement locker. Are you ready to respond officer? *This is a stationary standing experience only*
review_1: This demo can be fun, but you are only able to play one round of it until you have to remove it and redownload it to play again. Also walking and movement should definitely be added to give an even better experience. This update could only added to the actual game if it really needs to, but it would make it way better.
review_2: The demo was very fun and stuff until they removed the gun
review_3: Can you add more levels for free instead of buying the game and the guns
review_5: The overall intent of the project is good but the physics engine is very slow and clumsy. I really wanna like this game but the unresponsive mechanics makes it frustrating
